last_episode_to_air.name: Hostel Departure
last_episode_to_air.overview: It's the end of a journey where everyone gets to say their final goodbyes to their beloved hostel. But each person does it in their own way.

name: Hostel Daze
overview: Four naive and vulnerable wing-mates develop lasting bonds as they jostle hard to survive the first semester in a hostel. Peppered with absurdities, chutzpahs, clashes and debacles inherent to hostel life, 'Hostel Daze' depicts the grill that every Indian hostel-resident goes through.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: 6 friends enter their second year of college and dig deeper into the notorious universe of an Indian hostel. Hostel Daze Season 2 incorporates the second chapter of hostel-life in the lives of Ankit, Jaat, Chirag, Jhantoo, Akanksha and Nabomita. The problems, the hurdles and the unlimited quirks have now doubled.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: After experiencing the exhilarating freedom of the initial years and having had their fair share of fun in the past two years; Ankit, Akanksha, Jaat, Jhantoo, Nabomita and Chirag take on the third year, a roller coaster ride of newer awakenings and unique experiences.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: The hostilities are now in their final year, and the gang is ready to face one of the toughest exams of their lives before bidding one last adieu to their home away from home - Hostel.

episodes.name: Intro
episodes.overview: Ankit Pandey enters hostel to ﬁnd that the room allotted to him is already occupied by Chirag and Jaat. He has to ﬁnd himself a room, and a bed that too in the ragging period.

episodes.name: Proving Identity
episodes.overview: Ankit grapples with identity crisis as he ﬁnds himself pretty ordinary amongst his batch-mates.

episodes.name: F.O.S.L.A
episodes.overview: Ankit is smitten by Akanksha, the most prized catch of not only his batch but the entire college. Will a coy Ankit succeed?

episodes.name: GPL
episodes.overview: Ankit tries to hide his birthday from his wing-mates to avoid the dreaded GPL. Will he succeed?

episodes.name: End Sem
episodes.overview: With Chirag suddenly gone unavailable at the last moment, Ankit and Jhantoo have to survive the end-sems.

episodes.name: D.I.S.C.O
episodes.overview: The gang is a year older and realises their authoritative role as seniors not realising that “breaking ice” with the juniors could land them into trouble.

episodes.name: Love-Square
episodes.overview: We have all been through love triangles. But when Jaat and Jhantoo end up falling for the same girl a love square is formed. With Ankit and Chirag as catalysts, both pursue Unnati, the heartthrob of the hostel.

episodes.name: Gandagi
episodes.overview: Ankit does everything in his power to woo Akanksha by showing her how clean he is in a typical dirty boys hostel. Akanksha however doesn’t seem impressed leaving Ankit heartbroken.

episodes.name: Ghar Wapsi
episodes.overview: The gang is all prepared to leave for their homes during the break except for Jhantoo who must stay back. Through the course of the days the boys discover if home is the place to stay or hostel, the place to be.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: 6 friends enter their second year of college and dig deeper into the notorious universe of an Indian hostel. Hostel Daze Season 2 incorporates the second chapter of hostel-life in the lives of Ankit, Jaat, Chirag, Jhantoo, Akanksha and Nabomita. The problems, the hurdles and the unlimited quirks have now doubled.

episodes.name: Failed Experiments
episodes.overview: In order to make their lives exciting in third year, the group put themselves through a series of experiments.

episodes.name: Wing Chor
episodes.overview: Chirag turns detective to find a notorious thief in the hostel, meanwhile someone spills Akanksha’s secrets to her mother.

episodes.name: Lights Camera Cut
episodes.overview: The team led by Chirag, gears up to make a short film in order to win the inter-hostel competition.

episodes.name: Dosti Ka Udhar
episodes.overview: The group gets divided as a dispute ensues between two friends messing up their friendship.

episodes.name: G.S.H.A
episodes.overview: Jhantoo contests election against a worthy opponent for the post of General Secretary of Hostel Affairs.

episodes.name: Dear Seniors
episodes.overview: As the year ends, the group prepares to bid a final goodbye to their seniors, also introspecting their own relationships.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: After experiencing the exhilarating freedom of the initial years and having had their fair share of fun in the past two years; Ankit, Akanksha, Jaat, Jhantoo, Nabomita and Chirag take on the third year, a roller coaster ride of newer awakenings and unique experiences.

episodes.name: Single Room
episodes.overview: As the seniors are allotted single rooms in the hostel, the gang refuses to get serious about their final year until reality hits them in the form of an unexpected event.

episodes.name: Curriculum Vitae
episodes.overview: Ankit struggles to write his CV while Chirag and Nabomita have a difficult time keeping their relationship a secret.

episodes.name: Compromise
episodes.overview: Jhantu tries to focus on his placements preparation but ends up getting involved in a hostel fight

episodes.name: Day Zero
episodes.overview: Day Zero of placement is here and its a testing time for the group.

episodes.name: The Offer
episodes.overview: Tensions rise high as the placement season is in it’s full swing and the gang must give it all to leave the hostel with a job in hand.

episodes.name: Hostel Departure
episodes.overview: It's the end of a journey where everyone gets to say their final goodbyes to their beloved hostel. But each person does it in their own way.

4.name: Season 4
4.overview: The hostilities are now in their final year, and the gang is ready to face one of the toughest exams of their lives before bidding one last adieu to their home away from home - Hostel.
